title: Flag of Ingushetia
text:
The flag of <a href="Ingushetia">Ingushetia</a> (), in the <a href="Russian%20Federation">Russian Federation</a>, was adopted in 1994. It shows a red <a href="triskelion">triskelion</a> symbol on a white background, with narrow green horizontal stripes above and below.
Symbolism.
In the religion and philosophy of the <a href="Ingush%20people">Ingush people</a>, the Solar emblem (in the center of the flag) represents not only the <a href="sun">sun</a> and the universe but also awareness of the oneness of the spirit in the past, present and future. The red recalls the struggle of the Ingush people for existence and in the defense of their homeland. The white symbolizes the divine purity of the thoughts and views of the nation. The green is the symbol of <a href="Islam">Islam</a>.
